akn:section.akn:heading: Distance education grants for insular areas

akn:content.akn:p: (a) In general The Secretary may make competitive grants to eligible institutions in insular areas to strengthen the capacity of such institutions to carry out distance food and agricultural education programs using digital network technologies.
(b) Use Grants made under this section shall be used—

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Limitation on use of grant funds

akn:content.akn:p: (c) Limitation on use of grant funds Funds provided under this section shall not be used for the planning, acquisition, construction, rehabilitation, or repair of a building or facility.
(d) Administration of program The Secretary may carry out this section in a manner that recognizes the different needs and opportunities for eligible institutions in the Atlantic and Pacific Oceans.
(f) Authorization of appropriations There is authorized to be appropriated to carry out this section—
